name: Traversaal
description: Traversaal is a robust search API tailored for LLM Agents. Get an API key here: https://api.traversaal.ai

authConfig.label: Traversaal API Key
authConfig.description: Get your API key here: https://api.traversaal.ai

name: Google
description: Use Google Search to find information about the weather, news, sports, and more.

authConfig.label: Google CSE ID
authConfig.description: This is your Google Custom Search Engine ID. For instructions on how to obtain this, see Our Docs.

authConfig.label: Google API Key
authConfig.description: This is your Google Custom Search API Key. For instructions on how to obtain this, see Our Docs.

name: YouTube
description: Get YouTube video information, retrieve comments, analyze transcripts and search for videos.

authConfig.label: YouTube API Key
authConfig.description: Your YouTube Data API v3 key.

name: YouTube Video
description: Fetch video transcripts and metadata from YouTube without requiring an API key. Extracts captions, video title, description, and author information.

name: OpenAI Image Tools
description: Image Generation and Editing using OpenAI's latest state-of-the-art models

authConfig.label: OpenAI Image Tools API Key
authConfig.description: Your OpenAI API Key for Image Generation and Editing

name: Wolfram
description: Access computation, math, curated knowledge & real-time data through Wolfram|Alpha and Wolfram Language.

authConfig.label: Wolfram App ID
authConfig.description: An AppID must be supplied in all calls to the Wolfram|Alpha API. You can get one by registering at Wolfram|Alpha and going to the Developer Portal.

authConfig.label: OpenAI API Key
authConfig.description: Browser makes use of OpenAI embeddings

name: DALL-E-3
description: [DALL-E-3] Create realistic images and art from a description in natural language

authConfig.label: OpenAI API Key
authConfig.description: You can use DALL-E with your API Key from OpenAI.

name: Tavily Search
description: Tavily Search is a robust search API tailored for LLM Agents. It seamlessly integrates with diverse data sources to ensure a superior, relevant search experience.

authConfig.label: Tavily API Key
authConfig.description: Get your API key here: https://app.tavily.com/

name: Calculator
description: Perform simple and complex mathematical calculations.

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Generate photo-realistic images given any text input.

authConfig.label: Your Stable Diffusion WebUI API URL
authConfig.description: You need to provide the URL of your Stable Diffusion WebUI API. For instructions on how to obtain this, see Our Docs.

name: Azure AI Search
description: Use Azure AI Search to find information

authConfig.label: Azure AI Search Endpoint
authConfig.description: You need to provide your Endpoint for Azure AI Search.

authConfig.label: Azure AI Search Index Name
authConfig.description: You need to provide your Index Name for Azure AI Search.

authConfig.label: Azure AI Search API Key
authConfig.description: You need to provide your API Key for Azure AI Search.

name: OpenWeather
description: Get weather forecasts and historical data from the OpenWeather API

authConfig.label: OpenWeather API Key
authConfig.description: Sign up at OpenWeather, then get your key at API keys.

name: Flux
description: Generate images using text with the Flux API.

authConfig.label: Your Flux API Key
authConfig.description: Provide your Flux API key from your user profile.

name: AWS Bedrock Knowledge Base
description: Search and retrieve information from AWS Bedrock Knowledge Base using natural language queries. Uses existing AWS credentials from Bedrock endpoint configuration.

authConfig.label: Bedrock Knowledge Base ID
authConfig.description: Enter your AWS Bedrock Knowledge Base ID. You can find this in the AWS Bedrock console under 'Knowledge bases'.

name: PostgreSQL
description: Execute SQL queries against PostgreSQL databases. Use this tool to retrieve data, analyze database content, and answer questions about PostgreSQL database information.

authConfig.label: PostgreSQL Connection String
authConfig.description: Complete PostgreSQL connection string (postgresql://user:password@host:port/database)

authConfig.label: PostgreSQL Host
authConfig.description: PostgreSQL server hostname or IP address

authConfig.label: PostgreSQL Port
authConfig.description: PostgreSQL server port (default: 5432)

authConfig.label: Database Name
authConfig.description: Name of the PostgreSQL database

authConfig.label: Username
authConfig.description: PostgreSQL username

authConfig.label: Password
authConfig.description: PostgreSQL password

name: Snowflake Database
description: Execute SQL queries against Snowflake data warehouse. Use this tool to retrieve data, analyze warehouse content, and answer questions about Snowflake database information. Only SELECT queries are allowed for security.

authConfig.label: Snowflake Account
authConfig.description: Snowflake account identifier (e.g., XTA17782.us-east-1.privatelink)

authConfig.label: Username
authConfig.description: Snowflake username

authConfig.label: Password
authConfig.description: Snowflake password or JWT token

authConfig.label: Warehouse
authConfig.description: Snowflake warehouse name

authConfig.label: Role
authConfig.description: Snowflake role to use for the connection

authConfig.label: Schema
authConfig.description: Database schema to use (default: PUBLIC)

authConfig.label: Database (Optional)
authConfig.description: Snowflake database name (optional - will use current database context if not specified)

authConfig.label: Max Rows
authConfig.description: Maximum rows to return (default: 100)

authConfig.label: Query Timeout (ms)
authConfig.description: Query timeout in milliseconds (default: 30000)

name: Snowflake Financial Analyst
description: Execute SQL queries against Snowflake data warehouse for financial data analysis. Specialized for financial metrics, reporting, and EDM database queries. Uses pre-configured financial analyst credentials.

name: Snowflake Credit Risk Analyst
description: Execute SQL queries against Snowflake data warehouse for credit risk analysis. Specialized for credit metrics, risk assessment, and CRDM database queries. Uses pre-configured credit risk analyst credentials.
